name: province
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool canadian_gas_prices.
Tool description: Provides current gas prices in Canada. Try the `/locations-list` endpoint to view all supported locations.
API description: Fetches the average price of gas in a specific province in Canada using the Canadian Gas Prices API.

province.description: A valid province name in Canada. Options include Ontario, Quebec, Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland and Labrador, Nova Scotia, Prince Edward Island, Saskatchewan.
